#summary EveManage release notes

= Release notes =

== 2010.11.??, version 1.0 ==
 
 * *Initial release on [http://code.google.com/p/evemanage/ code.google.com]*
 * Tabs: *Blueprints*, *Price sets*, *Calculator*, *Quick Calculator*, *Preferences*, *Dashboard*, *About*

 * Issue 16. Introduce blueprint prices for quick calculator
 * Issue 15. Wrong Rocket Fuel amount for Scourge Fury Heavy Missile Blueprint
 * Issue 8. Introduce calculation tab
 * Issue 6. Numeric inputs and validation for dots, minus signs and copy-pasted strings
 * Issue 5. Numeric inputs and keyboard shortcuts
 * Issue 1. Damage per job is not factored in calculations
